snippet.title: Hoplegs Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
https://www.hoplegs.com

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1395830/Hoplegs/

Hoplegs is a different kind of platformer with unconventional controllers. Each of the four buttons on your gamepad where you usually jump, interact, crouch and change weapons are now your different legs.

Social:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/AnderssonKev
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/anderssonkev
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WhyKev-10227...
Discord: https://discord.gg/tJjkbMc

Composer (Nathan Ross): https://soundcloud.com/nathanross4444
